entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor not scrolling correctly with Keyboard Up and VerticalTextAlignment #28491
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Drag and drop does not work in multi-window application #28487
  • Touch Screen Usage Cancels Out Mouse Functionality in Input Fields and Navigation #28476
  • [iOS][Android] BlazorWebView not releasing resources after page closes in .NET 8 #28475
  • I2_Spacing - Changing the spacing value to a higher number causes the scrolling performance to be slower. #28463

Closed

  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #27316
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [testing] Running unpackaged not working on net10.0 #28373
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Entry Completed Event Triggered Twice #27992
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Re-enable BlankScreenOnNavigationBack test #28376
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` #28416
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Method not found : **System.MissingMethodException:** 'Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Internals.PropertyPropagationExtensions.PropagatePropertyChanged #28464
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #27908
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] ScrollView with Nested BindableLayout Doesn't Resize Properly #28461

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Make tests depending on GC less flaky #28489
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Update dotnet-format-daily-main.yml #28488
    community ✨
  • [2025/03/18] In Flight Branch #28486
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28485
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [tests] Enable back some MemoryLeak tests #28484
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, memory-leak 💦, testing-reenable, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Enable back GetDrawableAsync #28483
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-reenable, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Remove api check for Android PutString #28482
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28478
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28477
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the … #28474
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix IsPresented property not updating correctly in FlyoutPage #28471
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Shell content title not rendering in Full-Screen Mode on MacCatalyst #28468
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fixed DragGestureRecognizer.DropCompleted event not firing #28466
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed BoxView improper rendering inside Border #28465
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Make IShape in MauiCALayer a WeakReference #28412
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 7 #28409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Stepper allows incrementing beyond the maximum value #28398
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Using CollectionView.EmptyView results in an Exception on Windows #28367
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for CursorPosition Property Not Applied Correctly to Entry Control #27220
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Fix API docs warnings #28469
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Fix: BlankScreenOnNavigationBack on Android #28423
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness
  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` - FIX #28417
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android, iOS] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #28400
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28447
    p/0, area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    do-not-merge, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed improper rendering of ThumbimageSource in Slider #27472
    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • What if we did not use dictionaries? #28322
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6

    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6

    t/breaking 💥, area-drawing, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3

    area-core-hosting

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
